titles.title: To authorize and request the President to issue a posthumous commission in the regular Army to Milton Holland, who, while sergeant major of the 5th Regiment, United States Colored Infantry, was awarded the Medal of Honor for gallantry during the Civil War.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 7/22/2005--Introduced. Authorizes and requests the President to issue a posthumous commission in the regular Army to Milton Holland, who was awarded the Medal of Honor for gallantry during the Civil War.
